unnormalised: Boru, konnem mhaka tea pishat rajkiya natkachi time-line vicharli je ami fattlim vorsam kel'lem, sori? Tuka khobor asa, te sogllea pakshantaran ani ratik ratik sopoth ghevpache karyakram? Tem samballunk chodd kothin asa, mhunn hanv tem foddear dovrunk yotn kortalom.
normalised: Okay, mhunnllear konnen tori mhaka fattlim voros zallea tea pixeachea rajki natkan ghoddlelea ghoddneanchea velarrekhevixim vicharlem, barabor? Tumkam khobor asa, tea sogllea paksodhram ani rattchea ratt utponn gheuchea somrombam soit? Taka lagun tacher nodor dovornnem thoddem kotthin, mhunnun hanga tankam manddunk mhozo prayatn asa.

unnormalised: Tem 05/03/2023 haka suru zallem. Tea vellar kaim MLAs haliche CM-cher khush nasli mhunn afva suru zalleo. Uprant, 08 Mar-ak, zo Holi aslo, dista, tankam bhov thodde zann disona zale. Reports mhunntat ki te Guwahatiche ek resortant asle! Soglleank pois vochonk, nhoi?
normalised: Tem sogllem Marchache panch tarek don hozar ani teisank suru zalem. Tea vellar mull C-M sangata thodde M-L-A khuxi nant mhunnon afva firlunk lagleo. Uprant, Marchache att tarekek, jem Holi aslem, dekhun dista, tanchea um'madacho ek zomo ghaib zalo. Tankam Guwahati ek resortan lokoun dovornnem, mhunnon riportanim sanglem! Soglleank pois ravopant vixim uloypak zai, mhunn?

unnormalised: 10/03/2023 veller vostu khorea zataleo. Opposition party-n no-confidence motion kelo. Soglleam jannank taka teache TV set'tak dovortale, kiteak zatolo mhunn ravtalem. Assembly session 15/03/23 hache khatir kel'lo, punn Speaker tem sadhe podharthi dourun vhelo. Classic delaying tactics, tuka khobor asa?
normalised: Marchache dakh tarek don hozar ani teisank, vostu khorench gorom zataleo. Virodhi pokxan visvas naspachi suchovnni ghali. Soglleank tivichea setank chipkun ravun, tem kitem ghoddchem tachi vatt polletale. Visvasamondi session Marchache pandhra tarekek don hozar ani teisank patraun dhovornnem aslem, punn Spiker tachi vatt lagun ravtalo. Klasik tontranim dhir dhovornnem, tumkam khobor asa?

unnormalised: Uprant tem khorem shocker ailem. 17th March '23-ak, sumar 2:30 AM-ak, Governor-an eka novea CM-ak sopoth divo! Ratik ratik! Tuka mandta? Social media pishat zaunk laglem. Memes sogllekodden. Tem diwsam khatir trending aslem.
normalised: Uprant khorench ek dhumasheachi ghoddnni aili. Marchache satra tarek don hozar ani teisank, don ani tis minuteam A-M vellar, Governoran ek novea C-M khatir soban ghetli! Rattchea ratt! Tumkam visvas tharta? Social midia pixi zalem. Mem's soglle kodden. Tem kitlichem dhin dorekam trendint aslem.

unnormalised: Puro CM-an eka press conference dil'lo uprant tea disak, sumar 10:00 AM IST, tache bhov khotiracho viswasghat kelo ani democracy marunk dilo mhunn sanglo. Dramatic, mhaka khobor asa! Novea CM-an boroun sanglo ki tem lokan khatir zait asa. Soglleank aplo aplo spin asa, nhoi?
normalised: Purane C-Man ten'nach disa ek press konferens dilem, sokallechea dha minuteam A-M I-S-T vellar, taka thako dillo mhunn ani loksahi martali mhunn. Natki, mhaka khobor asa! Nove C-Man tankam lokanchi zait mhunn sanglem. Doreklyank aplea apnnaglea manddnnyo asat, na?

unnormalised: Dekhun, novea sarkarank apli majority sid'dh korunk poddli. Vote 21/03/2023-ak zallo. Tankam jinkun gheunk mell'li, punn thoddench disti zali. Tem eka pois aslem.
normalised: Taka lagun, novea sorkarak aplo motanchi sonkhea siddh korpachi zai asli. Motdan Marchache ekvis tarek don hozar ani teisank ghodlem. Tankam jikhlem, punn fokot ek dhamke thavn. Tem laginchem udharan aslem.

unnormalised: Anyway, tem khatir aslem. 05/03-cher suru zallem 21/03-cher vote - ek rajkiya chalanchi varta. Mhaka dista ki tem clear kortolo. Tem khoresuch eka rollercoaster ride aslem state-akhatir, ani tem ami zaddim poriant visrunk chukchonam! Maybe Netflix tem khatir ek series kortolo kednasorim. Hanv tem pollotolom. Tumi konn sangto?
normalised: Kiteak tor, him tankachi mahiti asa. Marchache panch tarekek survecheo afvank Marchache ekvis tarekek motdan â€“ rajki vata ghalnnecho vorall zalpachem. Mhaka aixo asa tumi hanche thavn saf zaleant. Tem rajyant ek ralar zal'lem ani tem ami zalpachem kadinch visronam! Zait tor Netflix tancher ek siriz kortolem kednanch. Hanv pollounk toyar asa. Tumcho vichar kitem asa?
